reviewText: great dvd from a great series,2 episodes what are part of season 4 but well worth having in your collection
I ordered this to use with a weather unit at school. Unfortunately too much cursing and bleeping out so i was a little disappointed. Otherwise a good dvd for an adult storm lover
as a huge fan of storm chasers I was horribly upset when it went off the air.  having the DVDs almost makes up for it. this is a must have for any fan of tornadoes.
I  bought this as a Christmas present for my husband and he now loves the series so much I've ordered him Season 3.

I purchased the entire series of these DVD's; each of the 5 seasons.  I enjoy them - informative and fast action.  I am a weather buff so I do enjoy the weather information you learn when watching these DVDs.
Im a true Extreme weather enthusiast.,  and truly am fascinated.by tornadoes... This set of Data movies was very wellwell taken care of, arrived as time.  Im very pldased with my purchase..
Purchased as a gift, but the recipient loves it!
Kids loved it.
Already watched it in my jammies!
Got this as a Christmas gift for my wife. I both watched the video and it was one the better ones of these type I have seen.

This is a small compilation of the biggest storms that Josh and Sean and Reed were on before being joined by Tim Samaras. V2 was just getting started at this time and Sean was in TIV1. Still, it is quite compelling to watch, and the bonuses were nice. This makes a nice edition to the series as it does have some nice odds and ends not mentioned in the main series, and the storm videos are definitely worth a look and there is a little less squabbling going on here, as well as one incident where the V2 group had to try to escape one storm they had gotten too close to and it chased them instead.
Great gift - he loved it. Thank you.

I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my sister who is into this type of activity. You would have thought she won the lottery.  She loved this item.  It is my understanding that this item is well appreciated by storm chaser fans.
According to my daughter it was awesome but not a true 5 stars, more like 4.5 stars. Since Amazon won't let us do half stars 5 it was.
Bought this series as a gift for the old man, he's a weather nut. Great buy for anyone that enjoys watching the weather channel 24/7 ^-^

i haven't gotten this movie yet.  this guy is insane lol.  he never gives up on going on these dangerous quests for looking for dangerous tornados in kansas and texas lol.  and so he hears on the weather updates in texas, and then hears if there are any tornado warnings coming up, and then starts going onto these dangerous journeys looking for dangerous tornados.  i recommend this movie to everyone to watch , it's good to learn about these dangerous twisters, that hits certain areas in texas and kansas lol.

I know this DVD has mostly high ratings but I cannot for the life of me figure out why. The team, except for the radar technician who states he has a doctorate, seem like a bunch of excited children who are just running around yelling with no professionalism at all. I think some Ritalin may do the trick. If you are interested in Storm Chasing this is NOT the DVD to learn from. Your money is better spent elsewhere.
Great product and service.
This was a birthday gift for a 9 year old that is intrigued with tornadoes, and the people that follow them.  He was THRILLED when he opened my gift, along with a Storm Chaser tee shirt.
Loved it.
My daughter wants to be a storm chaser, so she loved it!
Thanks!
